msg: On the fs-atomic-renames branch: Bring up to date with trunk at r24877.

author: dlr
msg: Fix issue #2769, allowing for the removal of merge info for a path.
Implement this by removing both the path and its range list from the
"svn:mergeinfo" property.
* subversion/libsvn_client/mergeinfo.h
* subversion/libsvn_client/mergeinfo.c
(svn_client__record_wc_merge_info): Change API to remove the
"svn:mergeinfo" property only when the MERGEINFO parameter is NULL,
rather than when MERGEINFO is empty.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(update_wc_merge_info): If a rollback has been performed, and the
target WC path now has no merge info, remove the "svn:mergeinfo"
property entirely.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(mergeinfo_inheritance_and_discontinuous_ranges): Enhance test case
to wipe the memory of a portion of the previous merge, confirm that
we can commit the wiped merge info, and that the presence of the
property is retained, even when the value has been wiped.
